alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 03 at 3:07AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Maine, Southern Somerset, Northern Franklin, Northern Oxford, and Southern Franklin Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
